old:
我を倒しても――貴様は有限の存在――
何も変わらぬ――
new:
Even if you defeat me, your life is limited.
Nothing will change.

old:
ああ――復活か――終わりか――
死にゆく者の――恐怖と快感――
new:
Will I be born again? Or is this the end?
This is the fear, and pleasure, of one at death's door.

old: 我が輝きは永遠の象徴――
new: My radiance is the symbol of eternity.

old: ああ主よ――違うという――のか？
